title: Sovereignty outduels Journalism to capture Derby
description: Sovereignty outdueled Journalism down the stretch on a muddy track to capture the 151st Kentucky Derby on Saturday at Churchill Downs.
author: Associated Press

title: Twins' Clemens homers at Fenway in front of dad
description: Kody Clemens, the son of former Red Sox pitcher Roger Clemens, homered into the right-field seats in the sixth inning during his first game at Fenway Park.

title: Williams, 50, defeats Trump in semi-final to make Crucible history
description: Three-time champion Mark Williams produces a vintage display to defeat world number one Judd Trump 17-14, becoming the oldest ever player to reach a World Championship final.

title: Norris 'very happy' despite missing out on pole
description: McLaren's Lando Norris says he was "very happy" after qualifying at the Miami Grand Prix, despite losing out on pole position to Max Verstappen.

title: UFC on ESPN 67 video: Gillian Robertson sends Marina Rodriguez into retirement
description: Gillian Robertson turned in a dominant performance at UFC on ESPN 67, leading to a finish that prompted Marina Rodriguez to retire.

title: Valkyries waive former Maryland guard Shyanne Sellers in first cut to training camp roster
description: Sellers was selected 17th overall by Golden State in the 2025 WNBA Draft.
author: Kari Anderson

title: Verstappen brilliance beats McLaren to pole again, Hamilton 12th amid Ferrari's woes
description: Max Verstappen hit back from his point-less Sprint to upstage McLaren again in qualifying and head the grid for Sunday's Miami Grand Prix from Lando Norris.

title: Sabalenka seals third Madrid Open title with dramatic victory over Gauff
description: Aryna Sabalenka sealed her third Madrid Open title after the world No 1 ended the hopes of Coco Gauff with a dramatic victory on Saturday.
